eventDecorators.name: AcceptedTokenDeposit
eventDecorators.description: Emitted when a token is locked or the lock on a token is extended. Emitted when `curator` deposited `tokens` on `subgraphDeploymentID` as curation signal. The `curator` receives `signal` amount according to the curation pool bonding curve. An amount of `curationTax` will be collected and burned.

functionDecorators.name: addPayee
functionDecorators.description: Add a new payee to the contract.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the payee to add.

parameterDecorators.name: _shares
parameterDecorators.description: The number of shares owned by the payee.

functionDecorators.name: getRoleAdmin
functionDecorators.description: Returns the admin role that controls `role`. See {grantRole} and {revokeRole}. To change a role's admin, use {_setRoleAdmin}.

functionDecorators.name: grantRole
functionDecorators.description: Grants `role` to `account`. If `account` had not been already granted `role`, emits a {RoleGranted} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

functionDecorators.name: payee
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the address of the payee number `index`.

functionDecorators.name: record
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the amount of shares held by an account.

functionDecorators.name: recoverERC20
functionDecorators.description: Remember that only owner can call so be careful when use on contracts generated from other contracts.

parameterDecorators.name: tokenAmount
parameterDecorators.description: Number of tokens to be sent.

functionDecorators.name: release
functionDecorators.description: Triggers a transfer to `account` of the amount of tokens they are owed, according to their percentage of the total shares and their previous withdrawals.

functionDecorators.name: released
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the amount of Tokens already released to a payee.

functionDecorators.name: removePayee
functionDecorators.description: Remove a payee from the contract.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the payee to remove.

functionDecorators.name: renounceRole
functionDecorators.description: Revokes `role` from the calling account. Roles are often managed via {grantRole} and {revokeRole}: this function's purpose is to provide a mechanism for accounts to lose their privileges if they are compromised (such as when a trusted device is misplaced). If the calling account had been revoked `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must be `account`.

functionDecorators.name: revokeRole
functionDecorators.description: Revokes `role` from `account`. If `account` had been granted `role`, emits a {RoleRevoked} event. Requirements: - the caller must have ``role``'s admin role.

functionDecorators.name: shares
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the amount of shares held by an account.

functionDecorators.name: totalReleased
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the total amount of Tokens already released.

functionDecorators.name: totalShares
functionDecorators.description: Getter for the total shares held by payees.

parameterDecorators.name: to
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the shares destinatary to transfer to.

parameterDecorators.name: sharesAmount
parameterDecorators.description: The number of shares to be transfered by the transferrer.

functionDecorators.name: updatePayee
functionDecorators.description: Add a new payee to the contract.

parameterDecorators.name: account
parameterDecorators.description: The address of the payee to add.

parameterDecorators.name: _shares
parameterDecorators.description: The number of shares owned by the payee.
